mapper.select: select g.innerID, ddfin.corporatename as financecode, g.guaranteeSum, ddgs.statName as guaranteeStat, g.origincertno from guarantee g LEFT JOIN dd_financeorg ddfin on g.financecode = ddfin.financecode LEFT JOIN dd_guaranteestat ddgs on g.guaranteeStat = ddgs.statCode where g.innerID = #{innerID}
